select dp.dailypt_no, dp.mem_no, dp.emp_no, dp.pt_date, dp.af_weight , dp.aerobic , dp.diet , dp.str, m.name AS member_name, e.name AS emp_name
from daily_pt dp
JOIN member m ON dp.mem_no = m.mem_no JOIN emp e ON dp.emp_no = e.emp_no
where dailypt_no = #{dailypt_no};
